review: I would like to buy another if offered for same price as my first one..!!

review: Not sure how much of my data allowance it will take up. But seems very easy set up and operation.

review: Device works very well for my daughter she's able to watch Netflix and also play games even able to watch YouTube videos

review: I like it but we have to constantly reset it because it just stops working after a while. I'm not sure why, but it is very annoying.
author: Amazon Customer

review: It's so easy to set up and very simple remote. I have prime and Netflix, lots to catch up on.

review: Awesome. installs in seconds, access to thousands of movies and TV shows with Amazon Prime. Works flawlessly.
